ayas.translation: The Sure Reality!

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

ayas.translation: What is the Sure Reality?
And what will make thee realise what the Sure Reality is?
The Thamud and the 'Ad People (branded) as false the Stunning Calamity!
But the Thamud,- they were destroyed by a terrible Storm of thunder and lightning!

ayas.arabic: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
ayas.translation: And the 'Ad, they were destroyed by a furious Wind, exceedingly violent;

ayas.arabic: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
ayas.translation: He made it rage against them seven nights and eight days in succession: so that thou couldst see the (whole) people lying prostrate in its (path), as they had been roots of hollow palm-trees tumbled down!
ayas.transliteration: sakhharahā `alayhim sab`a layālin wathamāniyata ayyāmin ḥusūman fataral qawma fīhā ṣar`ā ka-annahum a`jāzu nakhlin khāwiyah

ayas.translation: Then seest thou any of them left surviving?

ayas.arabic: وَجَآءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتُ بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ
ayas.translation: And Pharaoh, and those before him, and the Cities Overthrown, committed habitual Sin.
ayas.transliteration: wajā-a fir`awnu wa man qablahu wal mu-tafikātu bil khāṭi-ah

ayas.arabic: فَعَصَوْا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَّابِيَةً
ayas.translation: And disobeyed (each) the messenger of their Lord; so He punished them with an abundant Penalty.
ayas.transliteration: fa`aṣaw rasūla rabbihim fa-akhadhahum akhdhatan rābiyah

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَـٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ
ayas.translation: We, when the water (of Noah's Flood) overflowed beyond its limits, carried you (mankind), in the floating (Ark),
ayas.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghal mā-u ḥamalnākum fil jāriyah

ayas.arabic: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٌ وَٰعِيَةٌ
ayas.translation: That We might make it a Message unto you, and that ears (that should hear the tale and) retain its memory should bear its (lessons) in remembrance.
ayas.transliteration: linaj`alahā lakum tadhkiratan wata`iyahā udhunun wā`iyah

ayas.arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
ayas.translation: Then, when one blast is sounded on the Trumpet,
ayas.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fiṣ ṣūri nafkhatun wāḥidah

ayas.arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَٰحِدَةً
ayas.translation: And the earth is moved, and its mountains, and they are crushed to powder at one stroke,-
ayas.transliteration: waḥumilatil-arḍu wal jibālu fadukkatā dakkatan wāḥidah

ayas.translation: On that Day shall the (Great) Event come to pass.
And the sky will be rent asunder, for it will that Day be flimsy,

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرْجَآئِهَا ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَـٰنِيَةٌ
ayas.translation: And the angels will be on its sides, and eight will, that Day, bear the Throne of thy Lord above them.
ayas.transliteration: wal malaku `alā arjā-ihā ۚ wayaḥmilu `arsha rabbika fawqahum yawma-idhin thamāniyah

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
ayas.translation: That Day shall ye be brought to Judgment: not an act of yours that ye hide will be hidden.
ayas.transliteration: yawma-idhin tu`raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyah

ayas.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ
ayas.translation: Then he that will be given his Record in his right hand will say: "Ah here! Read ye my Record!
ayas.transliteration: fa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu biyamīnihi fayaqūlu hā-umuq-ra-ū kitābiyah

ayas.translation: "I did really understand that my Account would (One Day) reach me!"
And he will be in a life of Bliss,
In a Garden on high,
The Fruits whereof (will hang in bunches) low and near.

ayas.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ
ayas.translation: "Eat ye and drink ye, with full satisfaction; because of the (good) that ye sent before you, in the days that are gone!"
ayas.transliteration: kulū washrabū hanī-an bimā aslaftum fil-ayyāmil khāliyah

ayas.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ
ayas.translation: And he that will be given his Record in his left hand, will say: "Ah! Would that my Record had not been given to me!
ayas.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu bishimālihi fayaqūlu yālaytanī lam ūta kitābiyah

ayas.translation: "And that I had never realised how my account (stood)!
"Ah! Would that (Death) had made an end of me!
"Of no profit to me has been my wealth!
"My power has perished from me!"...
(The stern command will say): "Seize ye him, and bind ye him,
"And burn ye him in the Blazing Fire.

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ فِى سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَٱسْلُكُوهُ
ayas.translation: "Further, make him march in a chain, whereof the length is seventy cubits!
ayas.transliteration: thumma fī silsilatin dhar`uhā sab`ūna dhirā`an faslukūh

ayas.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayas.translation: "This was he that would not believe in Allah Most High.
"And would not encourage the feeding of the indigent!
"So no friend hath he here this Day.
"Nor hath he any food except the corruption from the washing of wounds,
"Which none do eat but those in sin."
So I do call to witness what ye see,
And what ye see not,
That this is verily the word of an honoured messenger;

ayas.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: It is not the word of a poet: little it is ye believe!
ayas.transliteration: wa mā huwa biqawli shā`ir ۚ qalīlan mā tu-minūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: Nor is it the word of a soothsayer: little admonition it is ye receive.
ayas.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhin ۚ qalīlan mā tadhakkarūn

ayas.translation: (This is) a Message sent down from the Lord of the Worlds.
And if the messenger were to invent any sayings in Our name,
We should certainly seize him by his right hand,
And We should certainly then cut off the artery of his heart:

ayas.arabic: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَـٰجِزِينَ
ayas.translation: Nor could any of you withhold him (from Our wrath).
But verily this is a Message for the Allah-fearing.
And We certainly know that there are amongst you those that reject (it).
ayas.transliteration: wa innā lana`lamu anna minkum mukadhhibīn

ayas.translation: But truly (Revelation) is a cause of sorrow for the Unbelievers.
But verily it is Truth of assured certainty.
So glorify the name of thy Lord Most High.
